title: What Does Angel Number 1155 Mean? Intuition, Love, & More

steps.title: 1155 is a sign to express yourself more boldly.
steps.content: 1155 is a sign to express yourself more boldly. When you see the number 1155, the angels are telling you to share your insights with the world around you. Your intuition is correct, but you need to communicate it with others. Take charge of your life and be direct about your thoughts, goals, and feelings. [1] X Research source To express yourself more effectively, use “I feel” statements to share your emotions. Maintain eye contact in your conversations and make sure your tone and body language match the ideas you’re communicating.

steps.title: In numerology, the number 1 is all about taking charge.
steps.content: In numerology, the number 1 is all about taking charge. Numerologically, the number 1 covers leadership, self-assuredness, and the ability to stand alone. Ruled by the sun, 1 is a deeply creative number that serves as a signal to take charge and trust your instincts. [2] X Research source Becoming a better leader is about blending creativity and responsibility. Find new, innovative ways to support your team and solve problems, but accept input from others to improve your ideas. Avoid blaming your teammates or co-workers and hold yourself fully accountable when you make a mistake. The number 1 can be a helpful clue to follow your ambitions and be more self-assured, as well as a reminder to reflect on your own stubbornness, and impatience.

steps.title: 5 is a highly social and intellectual number.
steps.content: 5 is a highly social and intellectual number. Ruled by Mercury, 5 is the number of communication and experimentation. It thrives on being exposed to new ideas and excels in group settings. If you witness an angel number that includes repeating 5s , the angels are encouraging you to interact with lots of people as you can learn something new from each of them. [3] X Research source 5 doesn’t do well with rigidity and boundaries. If you’re feeling trapped by routine, 5 is likely a sign to try something new. Buy a new outfit, take a new route to work, or visit someplace you’ve never been before.

steps.title: The number 11 signifies spiritual guidance and awakening.
steps.content: The number 11 signifies spiritual guidance and awakening. 11 is the biggest sign to trust your instincts. While opening yourself up to input and new ideas is important, at the end of the day, the angels are telling you to go with your gut. Think and act independently and they’ll support your decision. To develop your intuition more clearly, write ideas as they come to you and refer back to your notes before you make any major choices. In addition, meditate regularly to clear your head of negative or confusing energies. Trust your gut both figuratively and literally. If you feel an ache or butterflies in your stomach when presented with an idea, your body is telling you something.

steps.title: Combined, 1155 is about embracing your role as a leader.
steps.content: Combined, 1155 is about embracing your role as a leader. 1 and 11 are high-vibrational numbers that emphasize creative expression and independence. Meanwhile, 5 is all about excelling and communicating in a group environment. Therefore, combining 1 (or 11) and 5 to make 1155 tells you the importance of being a bolder, more visionary thinker in the context of a social or group setting.

steps.title: If you’re single, open yourself up to new types of partners.
steps.content: If you’re single, open yourself up to new types of partners. 1155 is a number of expansions and new beginnings. If you see the number 1155, the angels are telling you a new, powerful love will manifest in your life soon. However, it will likely be someone you don’t expect. Be open to new possibilities and allow yourself to be romanced by new ideas and people. Stay open, because you’re in for a romantic and fulfilling adventure. While 1155 is a sign that a new love may be arriving soon, stay active in your romantic life. Ask friends to set you up, get on dating apps, and spend time at places (bars, coffee shops) where you’ll meet lots of new people.

steps.title: If you’re in a relationship, try new things with your significant other.
steps.content: If you’re in a relationship, try new things with your significant other. Because it has a double 5, 1155 is a strong signal to break away from the boredom of your current routines. If you and your partner have been together for a while, 1155 is a clue that you need some sort of change to spice things up. Take up a class together, travel to a new destination, or share something you don’t already know about each other. [4] X Research source Being spontaneous and silly are easy ways to keep your relationship feeling fresh and fun. Share jokes, surprise your partner by wearing a silly outfit, or go out in public together using wacky aliases. Remind each other of the goofiness of life.

steps.title: Take responsibility for improving your relationship.
steps.content: Take responsibility for improving your relationship. With two 1s at the beginning and two 5s at the end, 1155 is strongly influenced by both duty and teamwork. Therefore, 1155 as a whole is often a reminder to reaffirm your commitment to your partner and hold yourself accountable for any rifts like miscommunication or emotional guardedness. [5] X Research source Communication and vulnerability are like superpowers when it comes to fixing commitment and responsibility issues in relationships. By being open about your fears and insecurities, and assuring your partner the relationship matters, you make them feel closer to you and re-establish intimacy that may be missing.

steps.title: 1155 is telling you to take on a leadership role at work.
steps.content: 1155 is telling you to take on a leadership role at work. In the context of work, 1155 is a reminder to seize opportunities and step into a role where you can shine. If you work for a company, ask your boss if there are any new projects you can spearhead. If you’re self-employed, spend more time networking to create a community that can innovate and uplift each other. More leadership means more opportunity, which means more money. [6] X Research source If you already have a leadership role in your career, 1155 is telling you to spend more time with your team and listen to their input.

steps.title: 1155 can also be a sign your investments will grow.
steps.content: 1155 can also be a sign your investments will grow. 1155 is about trusting your gut instinct and 11 promotes spiritual guidance and expansion. Therefore, this angel number can also be a sign that your money will multiply if you put it in causes you feel good about like stocks or mutual funds. Follow your intuition and search for ways to expand your finances. If you do, you’re likely to see a positive payout later down the line.

steps.title: If you see 1155, it’s a sign your twin flame may be arriving soon.
steps.content: If you see 1155, it’s a sign your twin flame may be arriving soon. Twin flames are souls that perfectly compliment our personalities. Because 1155 contains 11 (which represents spiritual guidance) and 5 (which represents expansion), 1155 is a clue that a new magnetic attraction is coming your way. Your connection to this person will likely be a gut instinct, so follow your heart when you feel a bond forming. [7] X Research source If you’ve already met your twin flame , 1155 may be a sign to deepen your connection and loyalty. Twin flames challenge each other to be their best selves. 1155 may be telling you to look inward so you’re emotionally and mentally ready to grow together in the future. The best ways to improve yourself are to set goals and practice self-compassion. In addition, set some time every week to affirm and validate yourself, focusing on what you’re proud of before deciding what you can fix.

steps.title: Stay true to yourself and trust your intuition.
steps.content: Stay true to yourself and trust your intuition. 1155 is a symbol that you are fully in charge of your life and destiny, so trust your instincts and do what feels right. As long as you listen thoughtfully to others’ needs and feelings, hold strong with your convictions, and follow your own moral compass, the angels will guide you in the right direction. [8] X Research source Take a few minutes a day to check in with your body. If you notice yourself feeling more anxious (breathing faster/heavier) or agitated when you think about the consequences of a big decision, that could be a sign which way you should lean. Talk to your friends before making any big choices. While you’re the one who will ultimately have the final say, getting their input can help you look at things from different points of view.

steps.title: Be open to new possibilities.
steps.content: Be open to new possibilities. Since it starts with two 1s, 1155 is also a reminder to be adaptable and embrace new beginnings. Take responsibility for what you can control, but recognize when things are out of your hands. Free yourself from the restriction of past methods and find joy in the opportunity that comes from starting from scratch. When it comes to trying new things , start small. Begin a new book you normally wouldn’t read or cook a new recipe you’ve always wanted to try. Then, expand by trying a new class or visiting a new place as you become more comfortable.

steps.title: Remain positive.
steps.content: Remain positive. 1155 is a heavily-protected number, meaning it attracts a lot of good energy from guardian angels. “Only rainbows after rain” is very much the sentiment behind 1155. While things may appear tough, face problems head-on and stay optimistic, because several blessings are arriving soon. [9] X Research source One of the easiest ways to remain positive is to practice active gratitude. At the end of each day, focus on things you’re thankful for and savor them.
